DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine short bout structure physical activity implement within classroom set part designate gross-motor playtime increase preschool-age child during-school physical activity level .
DOC.detailed_description: Most preschool center provide two 30-minute session gross-motor/outdoor playtime per preschool day . Within time frame , child accumulate activity within first 10 minute . This study cluster randomize control study design examine effect short bout structure physical activity implement within classroom set part designate gross-motor playtime during-school physical activity preschooler . Results intervention could provide evidence physical activity policy expose preschooler short bout structure physical activity throughout preschool day could potentially increase preschooler 's physical activity level .
DOC.criteria: Attend one 10 participate preschool center Attend preschool fulltime Children 2.9 5 year age date baseline assessment Did condition limit participation routine grossmotor playtime preschool Unable wear activity monitor
